__e: So, you're right, the time for negotiations is over.
- I'm not at liberty to say, Picard, but negotiations are no longer the answer.
Wait, why... because negotiation is the only way out of this situation, Oliver.
I opened negotiations with Ezri three months ago, but I can't seem to close the deal.
When I've finished negotiations with him, I will join you.
There is, as there so often is when dealing with the devil, an alternative.
